title: Chris Cuomo | A Closer Look: Trump Stands by Roy Moore, Pushes GOP Tax Plan
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump going all in on backing the accused sexual predator running for Senate in Alabama.

Then, Seth talks to CNN's Chris Cuomo about his infamous interview with LaVar Bell. Cuomo then takes a few more questions from Late Night's Henry Melcher backstage at Studio 8G.
